description: Removes tags from an IoT Device Advisor resource. Requires permission to access the UntagResource action.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The resource ARN of an IoT Device Advisor resource. This can be SuiteDefinition ARN or SuiteRun ARN.

parameters.name: tagKeys
parameters.description: List of tag keys to remove from the IoT Device Advisor resource. (string) ---
